website_summaries.verdict: An efficient and precise air fryer that will give you crispy, well-cooked food in less than half an hour.
pros: Digital display enables you to precisely set temperatures up to 390°F
Gives a light, crunchy outer texture without burning or making the insides too tough
cons: This air fryer may not be large enough if you're cooking for your whole family

customer_reviews.title: Just one airfryer and a microwave, you're good to go.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 years ago from Amazon, and it still works great! I have also tossed out the counter toaster, this one tool does most of the crisps-ing job done: toasts, grilled cheese (melt the cheese a bit in your microwave first), french fries, sweet potato fries (get those frozen bags from the store), grilled chicken, grilled fish, korean Kalbi BBQ, you name it! The product continues to perform the same after 2 years. The bottom bucket lining does have wear-and-tear chipping off but since it doesn't really touch the food, I don't worry about it much. I do wish they have replacement bucket only available though.
customer_reviews.author: TiniK

customer_reviews.title: Best appliance you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been happier with the purchase of a small kitchen appliance. Not only does it make great fries with practically no oil, saving hundreds of calories, but makes great crispy "fried chicken." It is also the best way to reheat a slice of pizza, leaving the crust crispy and the top bubbly. Gone are the days of the gummy crust produced by microwave re-heating. I recently used it to re-heat General Tsao chicken and was delighted with the crunchy texture and caramelized glaze. It has earned a permanent place on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa DeStefano

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!!  Easy to use, FAST COOKING, easy clean up. Could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this little oven. Perfect for single or couple. I put frozen rolled tacos on bottom and two handfuls of fries on top rack...15-mins later, dinner is ready! I use this for meals, snacks, etc. Don't know how I ever lived without this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough great things about this product. Two family members have made the same purchase after seeing how great this appliance does. We moved away from anything oil fried and the AirFryer provides us with crispy fries, shrimp, black bean patties, grilled cheese, onion rings, chicken patties, and so much more as if they were oil fried. Amazing product that never leaves our counter top. Best small appliance I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Route66Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product. While it has many diverse uses, primarily we use it to fry things like french fries, tater tots and other food that would normally be friend in oil. My kids joked that we had tater tots every day for a month when we first bought it. The one thing that I was a little disappointed in is that the homemade fries didn't turn out very well. I followed the directions a number of times, but they never turned out great. They were "okay", but vastly inferior to frozen fries (prepared in the Philips).
customer_reviews.author: Brian. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Late to jump on the air fryer bandwagon but now that I have one can't believe I waited so long to get one. Love this thing and is especially worth the price as it's a way better option than turning the oven on during this hot summer we are having. Two thumbs up from me and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We use it just about every day.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both love this air fryer! She uses it ever day and I almost every day. I love making sandwiches and putting them in for a few minutes to melt the cheese and putting a crisp on the bread. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bretzke

customer_reviews.title: great product, easy to work~!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product during the promotion, I think this product is great for a small family (1~2) people meal. works great!
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product for an Amazing Price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product, for an Amazing Price! Super Fast Shipping and the Air Frier looked like it was Brand New. Love it, would definitely recommend the Product as well as the Seller!!! Don’t Hesitate, Buy it. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Zegarra

customer_reviews.title: We weren't sure how good an air unit would be compared to an oil ...
customer_reviews.text: We weren't sure how good an air unit would be compared to an oil unit. What a surprise, works great, no mess or oil to change. Highly recommended. We have used for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: John R F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy cooking and great taste. Cleaning is a pain, especially for the wire mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Sunanda Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Best air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great air fryer! I first bought a different brand but had to return because it didn't work. I was hesitant to try another but decided to buy the Phillips and no regrets!! Love it,use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: What fun! Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: What fun! Great alternative....versatile. Kind of small...have to cook on batches
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ishizaki

customer_reviews.title: A very great product, just insert your food and walk away
customer_reviews.text: A very great product, just insert your food and walk away. I fine it is best to use on a porch or outside due to burning smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: my fiancé can't live with out this!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé can't live with out this! He has weird work hours so I'm not always up to cook him a meal!!!! Frozen food are cooked in one cycle. I highly recommend it for all you bachelors out there!
customer_reviews.author: BSL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this air fryer! My friend and her husband have the GoWise one and had food from theirs one weekend. We were hooked and wanted an air fryer for ourselves. We read the Philips rated better and I found this at a great price so we ordered it. It is easy to use and comes with a great recipe book. Clean up is a breeze and the baskets go in the dishwasher! Tip: If you're making cheese sticks, put parchment paper in the bottom of the basket. Melted cheese is a pain to get out of the wire mesh in the bottom if they cook a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Vatech90

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Exceeded my expectations! I am loving not using any oil if I want and everything turning out super crispy and done so quickly. Highly recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: nikki4187

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this product. I've been using it for almost a year and I even bought one for my girl friend. It not only allows you to cook "fried" foods without added oil but it also saves me from using and having to clean pots and pans (important to bachelors). We would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: rthouse

customer_reviews.title: awesome food. We very rarely fire up our electric ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time. Reduced cooking time, less power used, awesome food. We very rarely fire up our electric oven anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ed D

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. It is really just a counter top convection oven however I have used it so much and it makes my fries crisper than in the oven. Made homemade ones and frozen both worked well. It isn't something anyone really has to have but if you use it because you eat alot of fries it will be the best thing ever. I will say I am only cooking for 2 so a larger family would have to make more batches.
customer_reviews.author: Cab

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!! Have to return it
customer_reviews.text: I got a used Airfryer!!!! Very disappointed!! Have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome I wish we would have gotten it sooner. Wow cooks good food
customer_reviews.author: Alan E. Crook

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my sister, who is on Weight Watcher, and she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sauce!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing rocks. Cooks so evenly it's unbelievable. A chicken breast comes out so tender. From someone who can't cook...this baby is a life saver. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Never oil fry again.
customer_reviews.text: Through out your oil fryer, this is the healthy, modern alternative. I am glad to report that it even provides a better frying solution than any oil.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, makes really crispy food without making your kitchen dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Kelbert Gornattes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and cleanup is a breeze. Wish there were more temperature settings. Making sweet potato fries several times a week!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is phenomenal. It heats up in just a few minutes and cooks frozen or raw food really quickly and evenly. We do shake and bake chicken tenders in it and they come out better than the oven or frying pan in half the time. Works well on frozen wings, fries, tater tots, fish, a pizza slice, cubed potatoes. We add a little oil to the outside of raw potatoes to make them a little browner. Really easy to wipe clean but the basket can be removed and washed in the sink too.
customer_reviews.author: AussieDad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for frying , definitely will not work for DEEP frying.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN HIDING?
customer_reviews.text: I have had to take over meal preparation at our house and I am always looking for easy and fool proof ways to prepare food(I AM NOT A COOK). This appliance is FANTASTIC, it does everything as stated and more. I even enjoy experimenting. I am considering purchasing these as Christmas gifts for the family.
customer_reviews.author: R M C

customer_reviews.title: it is good for cooking French Fries
customer_reviews.text: I don't really use this product as much as I hoped. The microwave is more convenient and easier to clean. However, it is good for cooking French Fries.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W. Tade

customer_reviews.title: Great way to prepare dinner , less preparation and clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Air fryer cooks food as advertised. I made chicken and fries so far , cooked perfect. Expect to use it often . Will recommend to others.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best by far cooks frozen chicken fish pattie fries in about 8/10 mins.

customer_reviews.text: I Love it makes my life so much easier I get home from work put meal in set timer done to perfection how did I manage before LOL

customer_reviews.title: A great product Easy to use and creates superior food
customer_reviews.text: A great product Easy to use and creates superior food. Would suggest to any one.

customer_reviews.title: We love it.  Roasted veggies, fries, meat and fish to perfection.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I can say bad about this. I do 95% of all our cooking in it now. It is small so it is best for a single person or couple only. It cooks any meat or fish to perfection. Steak and pork chops come out grilled, moist and tender on the inside. My husband asks what are you going to make in the air fryer next? And we should have gotten this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loved it wore it out . Time for a bugger Phillips Air Fryer.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Use it all the time at our ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Use it all the time at our lake home. Great for grandkids to use. Easy and fast. No turning on oven .....

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Digital Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this airfryer . Received it fairly quick and have used it for 3 nights. Everything has turned out perfect. I would recommend it for anyone looking to buy an airfryer.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The best cooking appliance I have bought so far! It's very easy to use. When come to cleaning, the stains on the fan are hard to clean. Other than that, would recommend anybody to buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to deep frying and the food is delicious when done and oh so healthy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product and worked as advertised. I waited and did my research and boy, I'm glad I did. I Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend to anyone, this makes absolutely the best greaseless foods. We'll worth the money!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fries food without the mess
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Fries, hash browns, fish. Reheats fried food as well. No mess, easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: RKT

customer_reviews.title: Healthy frying without the oil and fat
customer_reviews.text: The best food comes out just like it was fried no mess no fry smell in the house love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy how fast it makes the food
customer_reviews.text: My family really loves air fryer. We enjoy how fast it makes the food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and the counter space
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how useful this would be, particularly with limited counter space. It turns out to be an every day appliance. I use it more than the microwave. It is perfect for one or two people. Frozen french fries and tater tots are done in 12 minutes without preheating and taste almost as good as deep fried. With the rack, you can make fries and frozen breaded fish or chicken at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Hugo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this Airfryer! So convenient and so much fun! It cooks everything in a fraction of the time that you would cook it in the oven, skillet or on the grill. A hamburger patty comes out crispy on the outside and moist and juicy on the inside! We are having a blast with it! I have used my oven in 2 weeks! Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy F. Deger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Mother's Day gift. Wife loved it and is put to use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: naveen

customer_reviews.title: and it makes some pretty awesome grilled cheese sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I have used this almost every day for the last few weeks. I've cooked steak, burgers, personal frozen pizzas, fish & chicken (both breaded and non), and it makes some pretty awesome grilled cheese sandwiches. It is fast, efficient, and easy to clean. Make sure to use some type of non stick cooking spray. I found an avocado oil spray at the grocer and it works well. The basket and tray are easy to clean with just a little soapy warm water. Pictured is a sirloin steak sandwich. Cooked on 390, 4 minutes on each side with salt, pepper, and butter. Put the bread in for the last 45 seconds to give it a nice crisping.
customer_reviews.author: DanielDJr.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Airfryer. Very aware of healthy eating, but also enjoy the occasional treat, this is the perfect way to make French fries!! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this machine
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this machine. Hate the calories of traditional fried foods. This is one answer. Have used it for "frying" chicken and fish. It is also a great way to "reheat" leftovers from our favorite seafood restaurant. French fries are much tastier!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product., make great fries and sweet potatoe fries. haven't tried anything else yet.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I've cooked almost everything in it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I've cooked almost everything in it. I haven't used the oven since I got this except for pizza. It is great for two people. I have fresh fish on Friday's and wasn't sure how well it would fry them, after some trial and error ( 2 batches) they come out awesome! Just make sure you preheat the fryer to 390 and after 6 to 9 minutes they are done without the smell of oil in the house. I can't say enough about this air fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: it's very easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought it with a discount price and tried making french fries last night for the first time. After reading the quick start guide, it's very easy to use and clean. The basket is machine washable which makes it even better. I will try to follow the receipt book soon, it's so fun. can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it is wonderful. The flavor of the foods improves when cooked ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it is wonderful. The flavor of the foods improves when cooked in it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I do a low carb-high fat diet but I hate frying oil. For me this is awesome because it cooks chicken much faster than the oven/grill. Only complaint is when using the rack making two layers the bottom piece doesn't seem to get as crisp on the top, but the top rack pieces come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Audra G

customer_reviews.title: Air frying is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My wife convinced me that we needed an air fryer and I was extremely skeptical at first. But now I have to admit this fryer is absolutely amazing. I love cooking with it and use it more than my microwave now. I just wish the cooking surface/baskets were larger.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Michael Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Food taste great, and less oil!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and food comes out tasty. You will have to experiment a bit with cooking time, but once you nail it down it creates really good results.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing..
customer_reviews.text: This is used about every other night. Frozen french fries, fresh french fries, egg rolls and now hot dogs.... Amazing...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter says it does what it is supposed to do but her family prefers frying in oil.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. It cooks well and fast. Need ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It cooks well and fast. Need to really get used to the faster times and temperatures.

customer_reviews.title: Very good cooker. We love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good cooker. We love it. Cook french fries only 5 minutes for 2 people. Chicken legs 10 minutes for 2 pieces. Now we can eat fresh cooked french fries whenever we want. Wish we have bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: S_S_007

customer_reviews.title: This is great! & well worth getting all of the other ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! & well worth getting all of the other baking and grilling additions. I just wish I had gotten this long ago. Takes little time to learn how to do everything. Best wing chips!!!

customer_reviews.title: came out really good, specially the chicken wings
customer_reviews.text: We tried chicken wings and egg roll, came out really good, specially the chicken wings

customer_reviews.text: This air fryer has been a great purchase for my husband and I. Recommend to download the recipe booklet as it has been Very helpful getting us started. The size is perfect for the two of us. For a family though it would be too small.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fries are crisp and not greasy. Can cook two things at once easily.
customer_reviews.author: Phil P

customer_reviews.title: Over a year with every day use - still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this AirFryer in September 2014 (so we have had it over a year now). We use this fryer EVERY DAY! We actually use this product in place of an oven. Meat comes out superb - fried to perfection with very little mess. We use a potato brush to clean the basket. We throw the bottom tray in the dishwasher every once in a while. Very easy to use. Very easy to clean. And lasting a long time for what we put it through. We even bought a backup AirFryer in case the one we bought goes out. The 1st one we bought is still going strong with no visual loss in frying capabilities. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Majesticzelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to have healthy food for a change instead of the deep fried version.

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fast cooking, usually 9 minutes for frozen potato products Easy to control the final result Clean up isn't so hard (frozen potatos are easy to clean but bacon wrapped scallops are much harder) Cons: High price For home made fries the result is more like baking instead of frying, Some sharp edges on the pan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Guilt-free fries eating is the main point. I tried fries and chicken nuggets so far and they all turned out great! Easy cleaning. Just soak the part in hot soapy water for a while, then put it in dish washer. It's expensive for sure, but it's worth every penny. Now I never have to clean up the mess after deep frying.

customer_reviews.title: Good Healthy Cooking Machine
customer_reviews.text: It cooks fast! It takes out the naturally occurring oils from the meats and is easy to clean. The only downside is it's too big to store in our cabinets. But don't let that stop you from buying this machine to cook your "meals in minutes".

customer_reviews.title: Like in most products
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the power only in 110V. Like in most products, it could have the power: 110 - 240v (bivolt).

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Way to expensive for what it does. May be OK for one person for snacks, but the tiny cook space is not good for volume or variety. Better to buy a good pan and go away for the weekend with the money you save.

customer_reviews.title: I would rate 5 stars,
customer_reviews.text: I would rate 5 stars , the only thing that when i cook hamburger or steak the smoke fill up the kitchen

customer_reviews.title: I have an oven with a convection feature. This ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an oven with a convection feature. This is essentially no different and more of a hassle to use as the space is more limited than a cookie sheet and my oven.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Boon

customer_reviews.title: Dog Petrified of noise
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this, I even taped the infomercial so I'd know all the ins and outs of the machine. Used it last night and returned it this morning. Our dog was absolutely petrified of the noise and the smell from the oil was terrible even though it was new. We had to open the patio door and get some fresh air into the kitchen. So disappointed hope others have more luck.
customer_reviews.author: Rhondda Colombatto

customer_reviews.title: It's a waste of time returning it
customer_reviews.text: The description doesn't match the product you received. It's say's °F but it's not, it was °C. It's a waste of time returning it. This purchase was made to seller National Mart. I love this product so I purchased another one from Amazon it self.
customer_reviews.author: alfe

customer_reviews.title: It holds so little food since it has to be ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds so little food since it has to be in a single layer to cook and still doesn't cook evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: CELUIS ONLY MODEL
customer_reviews.text: The seller of this item is shipping Canadian/European models..So all temperature settings are in Celsius..I spoke directly with Phillips and was told there is no way to change this setting.. It is preset from the factory based upon where the unit is suppose to ship...
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but handy if you have the extra cash
customer_reviews.text: This is handy, if pricey, and a nice kitchen appliance/toy. You can get similar results from a convection oven, but this is a bit faster, and you don't have to heat up the oven. You also don't have the OIL smell in your house after deep frying. The worst of the appliance is with the instructions... like how long/what temp for a variety of frozen foods... which would be helpful. So, you do a bit by trial and error, and keep track of your results. I do like it, but If you have a tight budget, it would be as nutty as a young person buying Obamacare.
customer_reviews.author: FLASH

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Was so excited to get this as a gift and then... What a bummer. #1 it's huge outside, but the cooking compartment itself is really small. #2 fried food does NOT taste like fried food, like they advertise. My potstickers turned out like they've been dried in air, not fried w/ oil. #3 it's really hard to clean. This one's definitely going back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use Product -(see comments)
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use the product. I have a broken wrist and this product is heavy. Also, had difficulty releasing the inside basket. Otherwise nice product
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Jones

customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT 3. TWO ARRIVED CRACKED. HUGE MACHINES. TAKE A LOT OF SPACE. WASN'T IMPESSED. GOT RID OF MINE. SEARCHING FOR ANOTHER LOW FAT OPTION.

product_meta.title: Philips Digital Airfryer, The Original Airfryer, Fry Healthy with 75% Less Fat, Black HD9230/26
product_meta.description: Philips Digital Airfryer, The Original Airfryer, Fry Healthy with 75% Less Fat, Black HD9230/26
feature_bullets: Air is the new oil. Fry and cook healthier food with up to 75% less fat.
Fastest and most even cooking thanks to the unique and patented starfish design.
The fully adjustable temperature control allows you to preset the best cooking temperature for your food up to 390°F
Double layer rack accessory is included! Maximize your cooking space and prepare entire meals in one go
Philips Airfryer is the world’s number 1 Airfryer with over 8 Million units sold. 100% taste satisfaction.
